successes.title: What We Do In The Shadows: The American Release
successes.description: From the Creators of “Flight of the Conchords” & “Boy” - Help Jemaine Clement & Taika Waititi bring their vampire comedy to the USA!

Pledges.description:
A DIGITAL HIGH-FIVE!!!
Imagine starting your day with a positive, reinforcing high-five from us... but conveniently on your phone or laptop!!! You'll own this high-five forever! Or until you delete it. You'll be the life of the party with this reward, especially if the party is full of people who need cheering up. 
Note: the digital high-five will be a pre-recorded video and cannot be personalized.
THE FINAL SCRIPT for "What We Do in the Shadows" will be emailed to you! (in PDF format). And you’ll get to join us in the SHADOWS with access to all of our upcoming posts, videos, and updates!

WHERE IT ALL BEGAN! You’ll be sent a special link to the ORIGINAL SHORT VERSION of "What We Do in the Shadows" starring Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, and all of your favorite vampires! (Just about a decade younger...) You’ll also receive the Final Script for "What We Do in the Shadows" emailed to you (in PDF format). In addition, you’ll receive THE FIRST DAY OF SHOOTING SCRIPT (emailed in PDF format), see how things changed on-set and what was improvised!

"What We Do in the Shadows" BABY BIB! Along with a special link to the Original Short version of What We Do in the Shadows. And The Final Script and First Day of Shooting Script (emailed in PDF format).
Choose from: 
- Vampires 
- Werewolves

“What We Do in the Shadows” ONLINE SCREENING!  You will receive a link and password to view a one-time Special Screening of the Movie along with a link to the Original Short version of “What We Do in the Shadows”. And The Final Script and First Day of Shooting Script (emailed in PDF format).

“What We Do in the Shadows” T-SHIRT! Along with a special link to the Original Short version of “What We Do in the Shadows”. And The Final Script and First Day of Shooting Script (emailed in PDF format). 
Choose from: 
- Werewolves not Swearwolves T-Shirt 
- Dead but Delicious T-Shirt 
- What We Do in the Shadows poster T-Shirt

“What We Do in the Shadows” BABY ONESIE! Along with a special link to the Original Short version of “What We Do in the Shadows”. And The Final Script and First Day of Shooting Script (emailed in PDF format).
Choose from: 
- Vampires 
- Werewolves

“What We Do in the Shadows” COOKING APRON! Along with a special link to the Original Short version of “What We Do in the Shadows”. And The Final Script and First Day of Shooting Script (emailed in PDF format).
Choose from: 
- Vampires 
- Werewolves
“What We Do in the Shadows” DVD! along with a special link to the Original Short version of “What We Do in the Shadows”. And The Final Script and First Day of Shooting Script (emailed in PDF format).

“What We Do in the Shadows” HOODED SWEATSHIRT! Along with a special link to the Original Short version of “What We Do in the Shadows”. And The Final Script and First Day of Shooting Script (emailed in PDF format).

“What We Do in the Shadows” AUTOGRAPHED FULL SIZE MOVIE POSTER by Jemaine Clement and Taika Waititi! Along with a special link to the Original Short version of “What We Do in the Shadows”. And The Final Script and First Day of Shooting Script (emailed in PDF format).

“What We Do in the Shadows” AUTOGRAPHED DVD by Jemaine Clement and Taika Waititi! Along with a special link to the Original Short version of “What We Do in the Shadows”. And The Final Script and First Day of Shooting Script (emailed in PDF format).

T-SHIRT PLUS ONLINE SCREENING! You will receive a link and password to view a one-time Special Screening of the Movie followed by an online Q&A (Feb. 2015). Along with a special link to the Original Short version of “What We Do in the Shadows.” And The Final Script and First Day of Shooting Script (emailed in PDF format). 
Choose T-Shirt (June 2015) from: 
- Werewolves not Swearwolves T-Shirt 
- Dead but Delicious T-Shirt 
- What We Do in the Shadows poster T-Shirt
LIMITED EDITION ART PRINT
A high quality 24" x 36" hand screen print of a design by Conor Langton.
This lovely print of the main characters in a coffin-shaped house will be exclusive to this Kickstarter project, meaning there will be no other way to get one!
Each print will be numbered and signed by the artist.
You will also get both versions of the script (emailed in PDF format)
Price includes shipping.
EROTIC ART DANCE PRINT BY ELECTRA SINCLAIR
A framable art print of the four housemates. Petyr, Vladislav, Viago and Deacon (dancing erotically.)
This enticing original piece will be a printed on high quality 180gsm matte paper. That is some nice paper.
We will also email you PDFs of the first day of shooting script and the final script. And a special link to the original short version of the film.

“What We Do in the Shadows” T-SHIRT & DVD! Along with a special link to the Original Short version of “What We Do in the Shadows”. And The Final Script and First Day of Shooting Script (emailed in PDF format). 
Choose T-Shirt from: 
- Werewolves not Swearwolves T-Shirt 
- Dead but Delicious T-Shirt 
- What We Do in the Shadows poster T-Shirt
LIMITED EDITION ART PRINT SIGNED BY TAIKA AND JEMAINE
A high quality 24" x 36" hand screen print of a design by Conor Langton.
This lovely print of the main characters in a coffin-shaped house will be exclusive to this Kickstarter project, meaning there will be no other way to get one!
Each print will be numbered and signed by the artist as well as the two directors.
You will also get both versions of the script (emailed in PDF format)
Price includes shipping.
EROTIC DANCE ART PRINT BY ELECTRA SINCLAIR SIGNED BY TAIKA AND JEMAINE.
A framable art print of the four housemates. Petyr, Vladislav, Viago and Deacon (dancing erotically.
This enticing original piece will be a printed on high quality 180gsm matte paper. This will be signed by both directors.
Plus the final script and the first day of shoot script emailed as PDFs.

“What We Do in the Shadows” T-SHIRT along with an AUTOGRAPHED POSTER by Jemaine Clement and Taika Waititi! And a special link to the Original Short version of “What We Do in the Shadows”. And The Final Script and First Day of Shooting Script (emailed in PDF format). 
Choose T-Shirt from: 
- Werewolves not Swearwolves T-Shirt 
- Dead but Delicious T-Shirt 
- What We Do in the Shadows poster T-Shirt

“What We Do in the Shadows” T-SHIRT along with an AUTOGRAPHED DVD by Jemaine Clement and Taika Waititi! And a special link to the Original Short version of “What We Do in the Shadows”. And The Final Script and First Day of Shooting Script (emailed in PDF format). 
Choose T-Shirt from: 
- Werewolves not Swearwolves T-Shirt 
- Dead but Delicious T-Shirt 
- What We Do in the Shadows poster T-Shirt

“What We Do in the Shadows” AUTOGRAPHED DVD & AUTOGRAPHED POSTER by Jemaine Clement and Taika Waititi! Along with a special link to the Original Short version of “What We Do in the Shadows”. And The Final Script and First Day of Shooting Script (emailed in PDF format).

Invite to a SPECIAL OPENING WEEKEND SCREENING of “What We Do in the Shadows” in LA with Jemaine Clement and Taika Waititi live Q&A! You will have to provide your own travel and accommodation in LA. (Special Screening will take place on Feb. 14th or Feb. 15th)

Invite to a SPECIAL OPENING WEEKEND SCREENING of “What We Do in the Shadows” in NYC with Jemaine Clement and Taika Waititi live Q&A! You will have to provide your own travel and accommodation in NYC. (Special Screening will take place between Feb. 12th-Feb. 14th)
BOTH ART PRINTS AND A T-SHIRT

Conor Langton's coffin art print
AND Electra Sinclair's Erotic Dance art print AND the T-Shirt of your choice (1 of 3)
PDF of the the final script and first day of shooting script. And a special link to the original short film version of the film.
Look in the updates to see the poster and t shirt designs.
